Layout/FirstArgumentIndentation.description:
Description

Checks the indentation of the first argument in a method call.
Layout/FirstArgumentIndentation.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: special_for_inner_method_call_in_parentheses (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['consistent', 'consistent_relative_to_receiver', 'special_for_inner_method_call', 'special_for_inner_method_call_in_parentheses'] (type: list)
IndentationWidth: None (type: NoneType)
